solution_line_template: He needs to burn {calories_per_pound}*{pounds_to_lose}=<<{calories_per_pound}*{pounds_to_lose}={total_calories_needed}>>{total_calories_needed} calories to hit his goal
That means it will take him {total_calories_needed}/{net_calories_burned_daily}=<<{total_calories_needed}/{net_calories_burned_daily}={days_to_lose_weight}>>{days_to_lose_weight} days
